item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

For Monday 9/26/2011 

Location: Harry's Sports Bar and Grill in North Haven (located in the Holiday Inn)

Now, you all know I love New Haven.  But as you also know.... I crave variety (if anyone's doubtful, attend my annual bar crawl a couple days later...), and some of our non-walkable-distance/non-new haven peeps have asked that we occasionally branch out of downtown.  Voila! I give you Harry's Sports Bar and Grill, a place the NHC has only visited once before (if my memory serves me correctly - I wasn't the host!). 

Specials: 6-6:30

HALF PRICE APPETIZERS

Beer and Drink Specials

So come early and stay late : )

Of course, as usual, you may come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text me (# in RSVP). We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar.
item.name: Happy Hour: Harry's in North Haven!
